segments.text: Did you enjoy that new movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That movie's just a lot of noise , same as Simon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had to go by myself , he couldn't make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? I met him just before I took off from Kitty's , he said he was coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Kitty's ? He sure gets around , doesn't he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looks like it . So how did he handle it to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His excuse was familiar . He said his car died again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that's a bunch of nonsense . It seemed ok to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Last week he gave me a lie about being too busy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think it's the time to pull the plug .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you want I'll let him know if I run into him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks anyway , but I'll do it , Rebecca . Let's get to class .
segments.speaker: S2
